Description:
Situated some 10 minutes walk from Morne Rouge Beach and Grand Anse Beach, this hotel lies around 10 minutes drive from St. George's as well as from Point Salines airport.

Comprising a total of 69 rooms and 8 suites, the hotel offers all the services, comfort and serenity one could wish for to enjoy the natural beauty of this tropical island that provides some true Caribbean flair. Available within the hotel are conference facilities, Internet access and Pirates Cove restaurant where a range of local and international dishes emphasising the delicious local seafood are served up. Spectacular views may be enjoyed out over the capital town of St. George's and Grand Anse Beach.

All of the rooms come with individually controllable air conditioning or a ceiling fan, cable TV, an en suite bathroom with a shower, a direct dial telephone, a coffee machine and a fridge as standard. Moreover, guestrooms feature a balcony or window that opens to let in the Caribbean breezes. The apartments and studios have a fully fitted kitchenette, a bathroom and either twin beds or 1 king-sized bed.

Guests may soak up the tropical sun beside the hotel pool. It is alternatively possible to go diving, snorkelling or on a daytrip, which the friendly, knowledgeable hotel staff are on hand to plan and book.

The restaurant, 'Pirates Cove' serves a range of local and international dishes with an emphasis on the delicious fruits of the sea. Enjoy a spectacular view of St.George's, the capital and Grand Anse Beach. Occasional live performance.


From Point Saline airport, take the main road and turn right upon reaching Le Chateau Restaurant. Turn left immediately after the Hotel Flamboyant and watch for signs for Pirates Cove.

Description:
Situated some 10 minutes walk from Morne Rouge Beach and Grand Anse Beach, this hotel lies around 10 minutes drive from St. George's as well as from Point Salines airport.

Comprising a total of 69 rooms and 8 suites, the hotel offers all the services, comfort and serenity one could wish for to enjoy the natural beauty of this tropical island that provides some true Caribbean flair. Available within the hotel are conference facilities, Internet access and Pirates Cove restaurant where a range of local and international dishes emphasising the delicious local seafood are served up. Spectacular views may be enjoyed out over the capital town of St. George's and Grand Anse Beach.

All of the rooms come with individually controllable air conditioning or a ceiling fan, cable TV, an en suite bathroom with a shower, a direct dial telephone, a coffee machine and a fridge as standard. Moreover, guestrooms feature a balcony or window that opens to let in the Caribbean breezes. The apartments and studios have a fully fitted kitchenette, a bathroom and either twin beds or 1 king-sized bed.

Guests may soak up the tropical sun beside the hotel pool. It is alternatively possible to go diving, snorkelling or on a daytrip, which the friendly, knowledgeable hotel staff are on hand to plan and book.

The restaurant, 'Pirates Cove' serves a range of local and international dishes with an emphasis on the delicious fruits of the sea. Enjoy a spectacular view of St.George's, the capital and Grand Anse Beach. Occasional live performance.


From Point Saline airport, take the main road and turn right upon reaching Le Chateau Restaurant. Turn left immediately after the Hotel Flamboyant and watch for signs for Pirates Cove.
